column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While we're on the subject of burnt food
column3: which upon arriving at the table I thought looked a little dark.  But before tasting them I gave them the benefit of the doubt and assumed that it was overcooked which it was.  How obviously burnt food makes it past the line cook
column6: shows a pretty blatant lack of care and concern when it comes to the quality of the food.  It's not like I couldn't have waited on a refire
column7: there was plenty of food at the table already and the only reason I didn't send it back is because I was already food.
